statements: SELECT * FROM savings_investment_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_type, balance FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE interest_rate >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance, interest_rate FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE interest_rate < 3.0 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE interest_rate > 3 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_name, balance, interest_rate FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE balance > 10000 AND interest_rate < 2.5 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Investment' AND balance > 50000 ORDER BY account_id
SELECT account_name, interest_rate FROM savings_investment_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND balance <= 5000 ORDER BY account_name ASC
SELECT * FROM savings_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM investment_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM savings_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM savings_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM investment_accounts WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM savings_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM investment_accounts WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM savings_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Personal' OR account_type = 'Joint' ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT AVG(account_balance) AS average_balance, COUNT(*) AS total_accounts FROM savings_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance, risk_level FROM investment_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM decentralized_savings_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM decentralized_savings_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type FROM decentralized_savings_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM decentralized_investment_accounts WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM personalized_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM decentralized_savings_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM decentralized_savings_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, account_balance FROM decentralized_savings_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, investment_amount, investment_return_rate FROM decentralized_investment_accounts WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM savings_account;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM investment_account WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM savings_account UNION SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM investment_account;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance, created_date FROM savings_account WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_account WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT account_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY account_id HAVING num_recommendations >= 3;
SELECT * FROM savings_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC, client_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_id, account_number FROM savings_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, investment_type FROM investment_accounts WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM savings_accounts WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, account_number, balance FROM investment_accounts WHERE investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description, goal_target FROM financial_goals WHERE goal_target >= 50000 ORDER BY goal_id DESC;
